Data Deletion Policy

We value your privacy. This page outlines our policy for deleting user data upon request.

1. Requesting Data Deletion

Users can request their account and all associated data to be deleted by contacting us at your-email@example.com.

2. Processing Time

Requests are usually processed within 7 business days. Once data is deleted, it cannot be recovered.

3. Legal Obligations

Some data may be retained if required by law or for legitimate business purposes.

4. Contact

For any concerns or questions, email us at your-email@example.com.
